pullrequest.title: Integrating new method for implementing visual and physical wave field.

content.raw:
I agree with the two points above and am happy to make the changes to this PR.  

As for the licensing change, I agree that a force of your original code would be great to provide heritage of the code.  I don’t think the repository hosting or type \(git or mercurial\) is particularly important.  My understanding is that we would just refer to your fork in the code here \(through links in the documentation and the source code, etc.\)
content.html:
I agree with the two points above and am happy to make the changes to this PR.

As for the licensing change, I agree that a force of your original code would be great to provide heritage of the code. I don’t think the repository hosting or type (git or mercurial) is particularly important. My understanding is that we would just refer to your fork in the code here (through links in the documentation and the source code, etc.)
